variables.name: DEBUG_SQL_LOG
variables.comment:
* Controls the printing of informational SQL log messages.
         *
         * Enable using "adb shell setprop log.tag.SQLiteLog VERBOSE".

variables.name: DEBUG_SQL_STATEMENTS
variables.comment:
* Controls the printing of SQL statements as they are executed.
         *
         * Enable using "adb shell setprop log.tag.SQLiteStatements VERBOSE".

variables.name: DEBUG_SQL_TIME
variables.comment:
* Controls the printing of wall-clock time taken to execute SQL statements
         * as they are executed.
         *
         * Enable using "adb shell setprop log.tag.SQLiteTime VERBOSE".

variables.name: DEBUG_LOG_SLOW_QUERIES
variables.comment: * True to enable database performance testing instrumentation.

variables.name: DEBUG_LOG_DETAILED
variables.comment: * Whether to add detailed information to slow query log.
